headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Corning (GLW) After A 91% One Year Rally?
summary: Wondering if Corning at around US$90.67 is giving you a good deal or asking too much for its story? This article focuses squarely on what that price could mean for value minded investors. The stock has recent returns of 1.9% over 7 days, 5.5% over 30 days and 91.1% over 1 year, which raises questions about how the current share price lines up with the underlying business. Recent headlines around Corning have focused on its role as a key materials supplier across consumer electronics and...

headline: Corning Earns CES 2026 Innovation Honors for Advanced Glass Surface Treatments
summary: CORNING, N.Y., January 05, 2026--Corning Incorporated (NYSE: GLW), one of the world’s leading innovators in glass, ceramics, and optical physics, is proud to announce that two of its glass surface treatments earned recognition in the CES 2026 Innovation Awards. Corning® Gorilla™ Matte Pro was honored in the Computer Peripherals & Accessories category, while Corning’s SurfaceIQ™ advanced anti-reflective surface treatment for automotive displays was recognized in the In-Vehicle Entertainment categ

headline: Will Strong Portfolio and Acquisitions Drive APH Stock's 2026 Rally?
summary: Amphenol's 96% stock surge rides on acquisitions, booming datacom demand and growth across key end-markets.

headline: GLW Rides on Strength in Solar Market: A Sign of More Upside?
summary: Corning's push into the U.S. solar supply chain is reshaping its growth story, backed by strong segment gains and estimate upgrades.
